alert.note: Alert for Logan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 3:53PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT LOGAN COUNTY THROUGH 345 PM CDT... At 252 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cobb to 6 miles southeast of Pembroke to 11 miles southeast of Clarksville. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Russellville, Adairville, Lewisburg, Cooperstown, Gordonsville, Danby, Spa, Epleys, Dennis and Dot. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
